summary: A unique player home built into a pillar like rock covered in awesome
descriptionHtml:
In this mod I have created a unique player home that includes a large pillar in the Riften area covered in mushrooms, aspen trees, a spiraling stone path that leads to the top where a home along with a forge,tanning rack, workbench, sharpening stone, smelter and even a crane (just for fun) can be found. inside the house you will find everything you would expect a good Skyrim home to have including a kitchen, living area with fireplace and dining table, alchemy and enchanting stations, bedrooms, (and some hidden stuff) plenty of storage spread around the house (all storage containers are safe non respawnable) and a back porch with an amazing view.

I am very bad at describing things so you will just have to check it out for yourself if you are curious

there are now two versions
Fungal Peak - with just the single pillar with the house
OR
Fungal Peak plus - that has multiple extra pillars around the area to make it all seem more natural
OR
Fungal Peak Plus Snowcap Peak - has a duplicate house in Solstheim with an illusionary rock wall inside the houses hiding a secret path that connects the two seperate houses

Requirements
Hearthfire
Dragonborn
Dawnguard

and I HIGHLY suggest getting a mod that adds color to the aspen trees, I use http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069/? (realistic aspen trees)
author: oldnotweak
